name: Magic Carpet

execute.description: carpet.exe low res invert mouse (f7 da 89 c3)
carpet.exe hi res invert mouse (f7 d9 83 fb)
hidden.exe low res invert mouse (f7 da 89 c3)
hidden.exe hi res invert mouse (f7 d9 83 fb)

content:
files:
- installer: N/A:Select the game's setup file
game:
  config_file: $GAMEDIR/dosboxMC.conf
  gogid: 1207658935
  main_file: $GAMEDIR/dosboxMC_single.conf
installer:
- task:
    args: /SILENT /SP- /NOCANCEL /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    executable: installer
    name: wine.wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/
- execute:
    args: -c 'mv $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG\ Games/*/* $GAMEDIR'
    description: cleaning...
    file: /bin/sh
    terminal: false
- execute:
    args: -c 'rm -rf $GAMEDIR/drive_c $GAMEDIR/dosdevices $GAMEDIR/*.reg'
    description: cleaning...
    file: /bin/sh
    terminal: false
- execute:
    args: -i 's|mount C ".."|mount C "."|g' $GAMEDIR/dosboxMC_single.conf
    file: /bin/sed
    terminal: false
- execute:
    args: -i 's|imgmount d "..\\|imgmount d "c:\\|g' $GAMEDIR/dosboxMC_single.conf
    file: /bin/sed
    terminal: false
- execute:
    args: '-c "echo \"0003d02f: 90 90\" | xxd -r - $GAMEDIR/CARPET.CD/game.gog"'
    description: carpet.exe low res invert mouse (f7 da 89 c3)
    file: /bin/sh
    terminal: false
- execute:
    args: '-c "echo \"0003d07a: 90 90\" | xxd -r - $GAMEDIR/CARPET.CD/game.gog"'
    description: carpet.exe hi res invert mouse (f7 d9 83 fb)
    file: /bin/sh
    terminal: false
- execute:
    args: '-c "echo \"0012d22f: 90 90\" | xxd -r - $GAMEDIR/CARPET.CD/game.gog"'
    description: hidden.exe low res invert mouse (f7 da 89 c3)
    file: /bin/sh
    terminal: false
- execute:
    args: '-c "echo \"0012d27a: 90 90\" | xxd -r - $GAMEDIR/CARPET.CD/game.gog"'
    description: hidden.exe hi res invert mouse (f7 d9 83 fb)
    file: /bin/sh
    terminal: false
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/dosboxMC.conf
    key: output
    section: sdl
    value: opengl
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/dosboxMC.conf
    key: cycles
    section: cpu
    value: 25000
